column1: #Text=Tonraq says : " I drove them out of the city and deep into the frozen tundra . "
#Text=Tonraq says : " We tracked them deep into an ancient forest .
#Text=I did n't realize the consequences of what I had done .
#Text=By destroying the forest , I unknowingly let loose angry spirits .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " They threatened to destroy everything , the entire city .
#Text=" Tonraq says : " Unalaq was able to guide the spirits back to the forest .
#Text=But by then , the damage had been done .
#Text=For being the cause of so much devastation , my father banished me from the Northern Water Tribe in shame .
